name: PayBit
description: Pay Bit is contactless, borderless and secure - all-in-one Crypto Payment Platform. It allows any business to securely and cost-effectively Send, Receive, Convert and Accept Cryptocurrency Payments Online across all major coins, tokens and stable coins in one place. Also send crypto to your friends or spend cryptocurrency at supported merchants without having to pay any fees. How Many PAYBIT Coins Are There in Circulation? PAYBIT Token was launched on January 4, 2023 with maximum supply of 21 million BTCPAY tokens. we have been listed on one centralised exchange and one decentralised exchange, circulating supply as of today is 1,218,381.37282 PAYBIT Tokens Where Can I Buy pay bit (PAYBIT)? PAYBIT is available for trading on a growing number of exchanges, with cryptocurrency. *[PANCAKESWAP] (https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x44f0e42EA6fD05F8fC5A03697438487d04632dC5) Listed on January 04, 2023 * [BITMART] (https://www.bitmart.com/trade/en-US?symbol=PAYBIT_USDT&layout=basic) Listed on January 6, 2023 Short term goals - Get listed on more centralised exchanges like huobi, gate, mexc - Opening up a dex where maximum number of tokens would be there to swap Long term Goals- - listing on top exchanges like Binance and Coinbase -PAYBIT aim’s to open a centralised exchange with zero fees by the end of 2023. Where the utmost priority is user’s funds due to which security would be our main agenda, while building an exchange.
